doc.title: Umbiko jikelele weSixhumanisi Vula Ngesandziso
doc.description:
Lesandziso sikuvumela kutsi ulawule kalula kutsi ema-hyperlink avulwa kanjani.

Lifasitelo: letinye tiphequluli, emafasitelo lavelako, emafasitelo lamasha, emafasitelo lamasha langabonakali, lifasitelo lanyalo (lelijwayelekile)

Emathebhu: ngasencele kwethebhu yamanje, ithebhu yamanje, ngasekudla kwethebhu yamanje (lokujwayelekile)

Simo sekusebenta: asisebenti, sebenta ngekushesha (lokujwayelekile)
